isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - LIGHT SYSTEMS - OPERATION

svcproc.title: Back-Up Lights
svcproc.para: When the ignition switch is in the on (ignition position), the ignition relay energizes and power is supplied to fuse F4-C. When the transmission is placed into reverse, the back-up light switch closes and power flows to the back-up lights. Power flows from fuse F4-C through circuit 71, a white wire, back-up switch (230), a black wire, circuit 71A, the left and right back-up lights, and ground circuit 11-GV.
